price: በአላህና በአጋንንት መካከልም ዝምድናን አደረጉ፡፡ አጋንንትም እነርሱ (ይህን ባዮች በእሳት) የሚጣዱ መሆናቸውን በእርግጥ ዐውቀዋል፡፡
arabic: وَجَعَلُواْ بَيۡنَهُۥ وَبَيۡنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ نَسَبٗاۚ وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمَتِ ٱلۡجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمۡ لَمُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalū baynahu wabayna al-jinati nasaban walaqad ʿalimati al-jinatu innahum lamuḥ'ḍarūna
